bill_title: repeal the South Dakota Board on Geographic Names.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to repeal the South Dakota Board on Geographic Names. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 1-19C-2.1 be REPEALED. 1-19C-2.1. South Dakota Board on Geographic Names created--Members--Meetings--Investigations--Promulgation of rules. Section 2. That § 1-19C-2.2 be REPEALED. 1-19C-2.2. Board may only act on name change if identified by law as offensive or insulting--Exception. Section 3. That § 1-19C-2.3 be REPEALED. 1-19C-2.3. Unnamed geographic place--Public meetings.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
